Route Friendly Name

Friendly name for your Time of Day Route.

Day of Week Start

What day of the week to start the time of day routing.

Day of Week End

What day of week to end this time of day route.

Time Start

The time to start routing this time of day route.

Time End

The time to stop routing this time of day route.

Route If Time Matches

Where to route the call if the time of day route matches this period.

Route If Time No Match

Where to route the call if the time of day route does not match this period.
